page.title: 15BENTWORTH HOME SURVEY
page.content: HOME LIFE LOCAL HISTORY Most people enjoy the peace and quiet and also the country side of Bentworth.People think there should be a village shop.Also some people find it cold.The speed of the traffic is a common complaint.Friendly people live in Bentworth.There is a limited amount of public transport. We found out that about 10 years ago people started to come to live in Bentworth.In the last 5 years 21 new families have come to Bentworth.About 10 to 20 years ago very few families came to Bentworth.Over 20 years ago many more families came to live in Bentworth than ever before. by Andrew & Jonathan.
